name: JumpNFun
description:
[Demo coming Soon™]

Controls:
WASD - Walk
SPACE - Jump / double Jump
LSHIFT - Dash


Content:
You play as Kiri, a forest-spirit / wisp. The example level also conains a rune-altar, which will later be used to unlock new abilities, as well as some gems/coins which will be used to purchase various items (eg. maps, health or speed upgrades).

Disclaimer:
All art, audio and the title are placeholders and subject to change!
I also do NOT own the music in the main menu! All credit goes to the artist Arnaud Roy (Link)

Consider joining the SilverRaven Games Discord to never miss an update to the project :D
